contest-event.event-date:
Dec. 2, 1922 D Northern Band Association (Championship Section)
Northern Band Association (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
northern-band-association-championship-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
City Hall, Newcastle-upon-Tyne Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £3, 5th £2. Best section 2 band - Coxlodge. 14 bands competed.
Oct. 13, 2018, 8:48 p.m. Jan. 20, 2021, 11:58 a.m.
1 St. Hilda Colliery William Halliwell Oberon [unknown arranger]
2 South Moor Colliery Silver Prize Band Joseph Crawford Dyson Bayreuth
3 Boldon Colliery Band William Heap Rossini's Works
4 Heworth Colliery Band William Heap Beethoven [arr. Round]
5 Hetton Silver Band Joseph Crawford Dyson William Tell [arr. Swift]
6 Chopwell Colliery J. E. Fidler Spohr's Works
7 Coxlodge Institute Band G. J. C. Ritchie Halevy [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Annfield Plain Gus Haigh
Unknown Result Brancepeth Welfare Band Unknown
Unknown Result Burnhope Colliery Welfare Unknown Cinq Mars [arr. Round]
Unknown Result St Helens (Bishop Auckland) Unknown
